sub_title: Business Intelligence - Power BI, MicroStrategy, Tableau and Qlikview Developer (Open for opportunities and with work permit)
summary:
• 5+ years of progressive experience in the Information Technology industry emphasizing on Power BI, Tableau and MicroStrategy 9X, 10X.
• Extensive usage of languages including SQL 2008, Aginity Workbench.
• Worked significantly with schema objects and public objects to produce highly optimized and performance efficient dashboards Power BI, Tableau and MicroStrategy.
• Mastered Transaction Services and mobile dashboards in Power BI, Tableau and MicroStrategy.
• Worked on MicroStrategy Object Manager and Integrity Manager.
• Domain Knowledge: IT Services, Finance, Banking.
• Strong learning abilities with keen interest in learning new technologies and best practices with passion to take on challenges to deliver and add value to the clients, good communication and interpersonal skills, accustomed to work 
in a team environment with tight schedules, and capable of working efficiently under pressure.

profile_positions.title: Freelancer

profile_positions.description:
Domain: IT Service Analytics, Enterprise Service Analytics, IT Project Analytics, IT 
Asset Analytics and Contact Center Analytics

Numerify’s platform provides companies with pixel perfect printed reports to 
interactive dashboards, from native mobile applications to automated alerts in your 
Inbox using Power BI and Tableau. 
• Product Management worked directly with clients to deliver the outputs on time.
• Worked extensively on Intelligent cubes and Visual Insights.
• Built the Enterprise Security Analytics module from scratch by building the 
schema, metrics iCubes and VI’s.
• Contributed on building the Reassignment Lifecycle of an Incident, Change 
Request Lifecycle and Request Lifecycle in the Service Analytics module.
• Worked on building dashboards and VI’s for IT Project and IT Service Analytics 
as well.
• Worked on creating and duplicating projects and maintaining the packages 
and versioning the same for tenants.
• Worked on validating reports and dashboards in Power BI and  Tableau.
profile_positions.title: Senior Application Development Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Client		: PIMCO (Pacific Investment Management Company)
• Pacific Investment Management Company, LLC (commonly called PIMCO), is a global investment management firm headquartered in Newport Beach, California, in the United States. The company runs the largest bond mutual fund in the U.S., and also provides portfolio management solutions outside of core-bonds, with investment strategies encompassing the entire risk spectrum, including equities, currencies, real assets and alternatives.

• Developed RSD’s, also worked on POC for the client and provided technical solutions for reports based on X- query.

• Worked on the project from end to end. 
• Worked on creating subscriptions of the reports and dashboards.
